text.title: Text Import
text.description: Type or paste your grocery list in any format. AI will parse and structure it for you.
text.placeholder:
Enter your groceries here...
Example:
2 kg apples 89.50₴
1l milk from Silpo
bread, eggs, cheese
text.groceryExample:
2 kg apples 89.50₴
1l milk from Silpo
bread, eggs, cheese
500g ground beef 189.99₴
organic bananas x4
1 loaf sourdough bread
yogurt - strawberry flavor
2L orange juice
text.pantryPlaceholder:
Enter your pantry items here...
Example:
2 kg rice in pantry
1 bottle olive oil
milk in fridge
text.pantryExample:
2 kg rice in pantry
1 bottle olive oil
milk in fridge
butter - expires Dec 15
3 cans tomatoes
frozen vegetables in freezer
cheese, eggs, yogurt
spice: cumin, paprika, oregano
text.equipmentPlaceholder:
Enter your kitchen equipment here...
Example:
Cast iron skillet - Lodge
KitchenAid stand mixer
Chef's knife 8 inch
text.equipmentExample:
Cast iron skillet - Lodge, good condition
KitchenAid stand mixer model KSM150
8 inch chef's knife - needs sharpening
Instant Pot 6qt
Stainless steel pot set
Cutting board - bamboo
Food processor - Cuisinart
text.recipePlaceholder:
Enter your recipe here...
Example:
Pasta Carbonara

Ingredients:
400g spaghetti
200g pancetta
4 eggs
100g parmesan

Instructions:
1. Cook pasta
2. Fry pancetta
3. Mix eggs and cheese
4. Combine all
text.recipeExample:
Pasta Carbonara

Ingredients:
400g spaghetti
200g pancetta or guanciale
4 large eggs
100g pecorino romano, grated
2 cloves garlic
Black pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti until al dente
2. While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes
3. In a bowl, whisk eggs with grated cheese and plenty of black pepper
4. Fry pancetta until crispy, add minced garlic for 30 seconds
5. Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water
6. Add hot pasta to the pan with pancetta (heat off)
7. Quickly add egg mixture and toss vigorously
8. Add pasta water as needed for creamy sauce
9. Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper

Serves 4 | Prep: 10 min | Cook: 20 min | Difficulty: Medium
text.mealPlanPlaceholder:
Enter your meal plan here...
Example:
Monday:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries
- Lunch: Chicken salad
- Dinner: Pasta carbonara
text.mealPlanExample:
Week of December 15

Monday:
- Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries and honey
- Lunch: Grilled chicken salad
- Dinner: Pasta carbonara

Tuesday:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with toast
- Lunch: Leftover pasta
- Dinner: Beef stir-fry with vegetables

Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Greek yogurt with granola
- Lunch: Tuna sandwich
- Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted potatoes

Thursday:
- Breakfast: Pancakes
- Lunch: Leftover salmon
- Dinner: Chicken curry with rice

Friday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie bowl
- Lunch: Caesar salad
- Dinner: Homemade pizza

Saturday:
- Breakfast: French toast
- Lunch: Eating out
- Dinner: Grilled steak with vegetables

Sunday:
- Breakfast: Eggs benedict
- Lunch: Leftover steak salad
- Dinner: Roast chicken with mashed potatoes
text.restaurantPlaceholder:
Enter your restaurant meals here...
Example:
McDonald's - lunch, delivery - Big Mac, fries
Pizza Hut dinner takeout: pepperoni pizza
text.restaurantExample:
McDonald's - lunch, delivery - Big Mac, large fries, Coke
Pizza Hut dinner takeout: pepperoni pizza, garlic bread
Starbucks breakfast - cappuccino, croissant
Sushi restaurant dine-in for dinner: salmon roll, miso soup
Thai Express - pad thai, spring rolls - lunch delivery
